00036 #ifndef _spottone_h
00037 #define _spottone_h
00038 
00039 #include <fromsys.h>
00040 #include <banal.h>
00041 #include <datatypes.h>
00042 #include <bufvec.h>
00043 #include <cxops.h>
00044 #include <oscillator.h>
00045 
00046 #define SpotTone_IDLE (0)
00047 #define SpotTone_WAIT (1)
00048 #define SpotTone_RISE (2)
00049 #define SpotTone_STDY (3)
00050 #define SpotTone_FALL (4)
00051 #define SpotTone_HOLD (5)
00052 
00053 typedef struct _spot_tone_gen
00054 {
00055     REAL curr,
00056          gain,
00057          mul,
00058          scl,
00059          sr;
00060     struct
00061     {
00062         REAL freq;
00063         OSC gen;
00064     } osc;
00065     struct
00066     {
00067         REAL dur,
00068              incr;
00069         int want,
00070             have;
00071     } rise, fall;
00072     int size,
00073         stage;
00074     CXB buf;
00075 } SpotToneGenDesc, *SpotToneGen;
00076 
00077 extern SpotToneGen newSpotToneGen( REAL gain,   // dB
00078                                    REAL freq,   // Hz
00079                                    REAL rise,   // msec
00080                                    REAL fall,   // msec
00081                                    int size,    // buflen
00082                                    REAL samplerate );
00083 extern void delSpotToneGen( SpotToneGen gen );
00084 extern void setSpotToneGenVals( SpotToneGen gen, REAL gain, REAL freq,
00085                                 REAL rise, REAL fall );
00086 extern void SpotToneOn( SpotToneGen gen );
00087 extern void SpotToneOff( SpotToneGen gen );
00088 extern BOOLEAN SpotTone( SpotToneGen gen );
00089 
00090 #endif /*  */
